description: A festive take on a traditional chocolate brownie.
name: Mince Pie Brownies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced. In a mixing bowl, combine the butter with the vanilla, milk and sugar until fluffy.
Melt half of the dark and milk chocolate in the microwave for a few seconds. Add the eggs to the mixing bowl and combine fully.
Incremently sift the flour and allspice into the mixing bowl while mixing. Add the eggs to the mixing bowl and combine fully.
Add the broken mince pies and the broken pieces of dark and cmilk chocolate. Lastly add the melted chocolate to the mix and combine fully.
Transfer to a buttered baking tin and bake for 25 minutes or until cooked fully.
Allow the brownie to cool slightly before serving with white chocolate shards as a garnish.
